ThingDef.label: bearhorse
ThingDef.description: todo.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All equine hybrids are good for caravaning. A caravan with one of them needs a shorter resting period, only stopping to rest between 23:30 PM and 4 AM.
